Reviews.Content: driven stayed pretty questionable hotels london flexible expectations hotel realize traveling europe wise bring sense humor totally unprepared experience oliver walk door whats cancellation policy dutifully interrogated ex kgb employee manned front desk ushered surprise yes tiny actually welcome london par course bathroom oh god im 5 feet 8 inches exactly tall wasnt sit toilet sit sideways accommodate knees laugh remember sense humor required wasnt particularly amused tried taking shower discovered wasnt space stall move arms literally soak water step shower soap scrub step rinse thank god night shower mistake downstairs continental breakfast included stay wasnt told continent question undrinkable coffee rubbery egg singular slimy yogurt miserable service edible speaking miserable servicenot single smile time employees offered consistently soviet service led believe inmate needless unless youre fresh avoid suspect bed linens love hear stayed hotel gone stay night

Reviews.Title: “False advertising & sleazy night porter”
Reviews.Author: Scott N
Reviews.Content: firstly 24 hour reception arrive midnight knock door key happen sneak main front door wake discretion female travel companion arrived 2am initially refused entry finally escort reason key ok actually attempt management day appeared surprised real apology remorse matter police 24 hr reception advertises 15 20 minute stroll oxford st etc laughable wondered walking people directions looked weird takes approx 90 mns walk oxford st thats rate knots avoid hotel rabbit staff sleazy basically offer advertise breakfast btw stale toast hard boiled eggs simply joke

Reviews.Title: “Awful, awful hotel - stay somewhere else”

Reviews.Content: didnt stay choice booked boss honest reading reviews pretty nervous stay oliver manager friendly arrived phone rang checking rude guest speaking theme stay appalling service tv didnt evening girl reception refused help change batteries remote manager fixed day left tv 1st evening london cold weekend im british im cold hotel refused heating breakfast morning guests talking sleep clothed ridiculous breakfast ok strange toast tiny shot juice awful coffee boiled egg sandwich ham strange location earls court exhibition centre time tourist id disappointed hotels price locations oliver please dont wrong im picky comes hotels oliver truly awful please save yourself nightmare stay else recommend travelodges centre advance deals
